death.attack.paperCut: %1$s was cut to death with paper
enchantment.morevanillalib.repairing_luc: Reduces the repair costs in the anvil to a minimum.
jei.morevanillalib.bone_damage.desc: If you kill a (wither) skeleton with these tools, you have a %d%% chance to make up to 250%% more damage.
jei.morevanillalib.bone_heads.desc: If you kill a (wither) skeleton, there is a %d%% chance to get a head dropped.
jei.morevanillalib.bone_tools.desc:
Bone Tools
Durability: %s (Hammer/Excavator: %s)
Harvest Level: %s
Repairing Item: %s
jei.morevanillalib.coal_double_drop.desc: If you use this tool, there is a %d%% chance to get a piece of coal dropped if you mine a coal ore.
